eu_initiatives: Common Agricultural Policy (CAP): In order to modernise and simplify the Common Agricultural Policy (CAP) in line with United Nation’s Sustainable Development Goals, Paris Agreement, and the conclusions of the Cork 2.0 declaration, EISA promotes that Integrated Farm Management (IFM) be integrated into the CAP as a part of the rural development programme.
organisation_name: European Initiative for Sustainable Development in Agriculture e.V. (EISA)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: Develop and promote the holistic Integrated Farm Management approach, and thus contribute to more sustainability in EU agriculture.
